PersonalStatement.text: Donald Lucero, born on 1967-04-21, is a Male based in Lake Victorstad, Rwanda. He is Married and holds Cameroonian nationality. Currently working at Floyd-Christensen.

WorkExperience.text: HR Manager at Parker, Perkins and Norris from 2006 to 2017.
Senior Marketing Specialist at Floyd-Christensen, 2020 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master's in Business Administration from Hamad Bin Khalifa University
Master's in Engineering from University of Silesia in Katowice

PersonalSkills.text: Adaptability: Able to quickly learn and implement new technologies.
Adaptability: Able to quickly learn and implement new technologies.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys cycling.
